org.slieb.selenium

Class LocalRemoteWebDriverFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.slieb.selenium.RemoteWebDriverFactory
      • org.slieb.selenium.LocalRemoteWebDriverFactory

  • public class LocalRemoteWebDriverFactory
extends RemoteWebDriverFactory
    A factory that creates RemoteWebDriver instances for locally installed browsers. Useful for quick testing against browsers, when installing and running a selenium server is too much effort.
